title: She's the One
review:
Sylvia (Zainab Balogun) is Richard's (Chris Attoh) dream girl. Literally. He talks to her as a real person while he sleeps. When he meets a "real" woman, his dream girl gets more than just jealous.

The film is an interesting concept, it just had a boring execution.

Guide: No swearing, sex, or nudity.
